data.title: The most interesting action games released in 2006
data.meta_description: See the most interesting action games released in 2006.
data.text:
Airborne Hero D–Day Frontline 1944

Action 10 January 2006

Airborne Hero D-Day Frontline 1944 is an action game that takes us into the realities of World War II. It gives a chance to take part in one of the most important and bloody battles of this conflict.

PC

Rat Hunter

Action 13 January 2006

A futuristic action/FPS game. The main character of the game is a journalist, who conducts an independent investigation to reveal the mystery of "disappearance" of workers in one of the factories.

PC

Rock’n’Roll Adventures

Action 13 January 2006

Rock'n'Roll Adventures is a typical platformer set in a strange fantastic world of music. We play the role of Elviz, like a vividly reminiscent of the late king of rock. The production was prepared by Data Design Interactive studio and released by Metro 3D company.

PCPS2Wii

25 to Life

Action 18 January 2006

25 to Life is a three-dimensional action game modelled on such hits as Grand Theft Auto, Gangland or The Getaway, in which the main character is observed from a third person perspective (TPP).

PCPS2XBOX

Curious George

Action 01 February 2006

Curious George is an action adventure game, whose storyline layer is directly based on a film of the same title, produced by Universal Pictures and Imagine Entertainment.

PCPS2XBOXGBAGCN

Finding Nemo: Escape to the Big Blue

Action 09 February 2006

Finding Nemo: Escape to the Big Blue - this three-dimensional action game is designed primarily for children, although older people can also enjoy it. It was based on a computer animation entitled Finding Nemo (Where is Nemo?) by the masters from Pixar Animation Studios (incidentally, the film was awarded an Oscar).

NDS

London Taxi Rush Hour

Action 10 February 2006

An arcade game in which we play the role of a London taxi driver. We chassis passengers, racing against the passing time and admiring the monuments of the title metropolis.

PS2Wii

Full Auto

Action 10 February 2006

Full Auto - the result of cooperation between Pseudo Interactive and SEGA - is a crazy car race in which it is important not only how fast you reach the finish line, but also how many opponents you can eliminate along the way....

X360

Drakengard 2

Action 14 February 2006

Drakengard 2 is the work of Square Enix, behind the production of the popular Final Fantasy and Kingdom Hearts series. This position is a combination of RPG and action game, and the whole is watered with a mysterious, Japanese atmosphere.

PS2

World War II Combat: Road to Berlin

Action 16 February 2006

World War II Combat: Road to Berlin is an action/FPS game that takes us back to the last months of World War II. We play the role of a young OSS officer (now CIA) Stephen Moore.

PCXBOX

Monster Hunter 2

Action 16 February 2006

Monster Hunter 2 is a powerful RPG game based on capturing title monsters and increasing your skills. The main emphasis, however, was put on gameplay via the Internet, which distinguishes me from the multitude of other, similar positions.

PS2

The Regiment

Action 17 February 2006

The Regiment is a spectacular first person perspective shooting (FPS), produced by Kuju Entertainment development studio. The player takes on the role of commander of a unit of well-trained soldiers of the SAS unit and takes part in dangerous anti-terrorist missions. The creators put a lot of emphasis on the realism of the game, in which the consultants employed in the production of the game - former members of anti-terrorist groups - played a significant role.

PCPS2

A.I.M. 2: Clan Wars

Action 17 February 2006

A.I.M. 2 is a sequel to the action adventure game with RPG elements released in 2004. As in the first part, the Russian company SkyRiver Studios is responsible for the development, which once again moves players to an abandoned planet, Range-4.

PC

Raze's Hell

Action 17 February 2006

Raze's Hell is a humorous action game created in the laboratories of Artech Studios, in collaboration with a well-known publisher, Majesco Entertainment. The title breaks away from the usual family product schemas and focuses on alternative storyline solutions.

XBOX

Sport Shooting Professional

Action 20 February 2006

Sport Shooting Professional is an unusual production, belonging to a small and slightly elite group of games dealing with sport shooting. IQ Publishing is responsible for the release of the programme in Poland and its full location. IQ Publishing enjoys publishing budget productions for a specific, usually quite small group of users.

PC

State of Emergency 2

Action 21 February 2006

The second part of the famous action game. Once again, we are taking part in brutal street riots. State of Emergency 2 stands out not only for its improved audio-visual setting, but also for its more varied singleleplayer campaign.

PCPS2

SWAT 4: The Stetchkov Syndicate

Action 24 February 2006

An official expansion for SWAT 4, a tactical action game that presents the work of special police forces. The add-on’s story is focused on fighting the Stetchkov family syndicate that supplies the streets with more and more illegal weapons as well as all kinds of drugs. In SWAT 4: The Stetchkov Syndicate, there are seven new missions to play, both in single- and multiplayer mode. In the latter, two 5-member teams fight against one another.

PC

Black

Action 24 February 2006

The Black story takes you to Eastern Europe, where as one of the members of a special strike group you are fighting terrorism. You have at your disposal a standard arsenal, known from FPS games, with the difference that this time it has been truly "pampered".

PS2XBOX

Final Fight: Streetwise

Action 28 February 2006

Final Fight: Streetwise is an item belonging to the genre of so called walking brawls. The modern version of the old but spring series of arcade fights was prepared by the famous company Capcom known from such series as Resident Evil, Mega Man, or Maximo.

PS2XBOX

Noddy and The Magic Clock

Action 03 March 2006

Noddy and The Magic Clock is an action adventure game, thanks to which children can play the role of a character known from the TV series - a small wooden boy living in the Land of Toys.

PC

Cotropitorii

Action 03 March 2006

Cotropitorii is a free shooter, prepared by Romanian development studio 2 Bad Design. The game is characterized by fast action with TPP view (possibility of switching to FPP) and relatively low hardware requirements.

PC

Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Advanced Warfighter

Action 07 March 2006

The third part of the series of tactical action games, created in the Red Storm team under the supervision of the popular writer of sensational novels - Tom Clancy. The action of this production takes place in 2013 in Mexico City.

PCX360PS2XBOXGCN

Samurai Warriors: State of War

Action 07 March 2006

Samurai Warriors: State of War is another game in the saga of the Far East corporation Koei. The company is known mainly for its electronic and entertainment series, referring to the history of China. The product also refers to the real events of the past, namely the so-called Sengoku period, i.e. the Japanese civil wars of 1467-1615.

PSP

Operation Sandstorm

Action 09 March 2006

Operation Sandstorm is a representative of the First Person Shooter (FPS) species from the value segment. The programme is rooted in modern realities and uses quite current topics of the armed fight against terrorism.

PC

Neuro

Action 10 March 2006

An action/FPS game set in the cyberpunk world of the future. The player becomes a soldier of the Territorial Confederation fighting the military clan Troiden.

PC

Red Orchestra: Ostfront 41-45

Action 14 March 2006

A dynamic first person shooter, with an action set on the eastern front of World War II. The idea for this game was born out of a modification called Red Orchestra, which won the competition for the best addition to Unreal Tournament 2003 and 2004, i.e. "$1,000,000,000 Make Something Unreal".

PC

The Outfit

Action 14 March 2006

The Outfit is another tactical action game, set in the third person's perspective, which takes the player to the battlefields of World War II.

X360

Neopets Petpet Adventures: The Wand of Wishing

Action 14 March 2006

Neopets: Petpet Adventures: The Wand of Wishing is an action-packed adventure game that allows PSP users to find themselves in an extremely popular world called Neopia, thanks to the web portal www.Neopets.com. This reality is inhabited, among other things, by nice animals.

PSP

Untold Legends: The Warrior's Code

Action 14 March 2006

Untold Legends: The Warrior's Code is a continuation of the dynamic action hybrid with elements of the cRPG genre. The game offers a choice of five main characters and multiplayer features.

PSP

Onimusha: Dawn of Dreams

Action 14 March 2006

The player takes on the role of Soka, a young warrior endowed with magical power. Fortunately, it is not left to its own devices. During his journey he meets four allies. You can choose one of them to accompany the hero in this battle of good against evil. Interestingly, the player can also control the other character or give orders as Soki.

PS2

Metal Gear Solid 3: Subsistence

Action 14 March 2006

An upgraded and expanded version of 2004's Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater, in which you control Snake, the series' protagonist, as he travels to the Soviet Union to intercept plans for nuclear-carrying technology. The main novelty of Metal Gear Solid 3: Subsistence is the online mode, absent in the original, which allows up to 6 players to play together in one of several game modes, such as the classic Team Battle or Snake and Enemy.

PS2

Syphon Filter: Dark Mirror

Action 14 March 2006

Syphon Filter: Dark Mirror is a 3D action game released by Sony Computer Entertainment. The series dates back to the times of the first PlayStation.

PS5PS4PS2PSP

Driver: Parallel Lines

Action 14 March 2006

The fourth installment of the popular car series launched in 1999, allowing players to take on the role of the titular driver in the service of the mafia. After the critical reception of the third installment in the series, the developers from Reflections Interactive studio decided to modify the mechanics and diversify the story. The action takes place in two time horizons: in the present day and in the 70s. We meet the main character as an arrogant 18-year-old with above-average driving skills.

PCPS2WiiXBOX

Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Critical Hour

Action 14 March 2006

Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Critical Hour is the next item in a best-selling series of tactical action games developed since 1998 and branded by a popular American book author of political thrillers.

PS2XBOX

Battlefield 2: Euro Force

Action 15 March 2006

Battlefield 2: Euro Force is the first of a series of mini-packages, the "booster packs", extending the content of the great Battlefield 2 action game for team skirmishes on the web.

PC

Commandos: Strike Force

Action 17 March 2006

A new installment of the popular series from Pyro Studios, in which we take control of a unit of specially trained soldiers, sent to complete various tasks that help turn the tide of World War II. While developing Commandos: Strike Force, Pyro Studios decided to try a somewhat different approach, ending with a tactical action game seen from a first-person perspective instead of a classical tactical strategy game that the series has accustomed us to.

PCPS2XBOX

Winx Club

Action 17 March 2006

The Winx Club is one of the games that were created on the basis of the first season of the Italian series of the same title (Winx Club). It tells the story of six teenagers using spells to protect themselves from the evil of the Kingdom of Magic. The plot of the game is an almost faithful representation of the film.

PS2

Seafight: Piraci

Action 18 March 2006

A browser game in which the player takes on the role of the sailing ship's captain and takes part in spectacular pirate clashes on the high seas.

WWW

Refuse. Home, Sweep Home!

Action 20 March 2006

Refuse. Home, Sweep Home! is a tactical action game, shown from the perspective of a third person. The story presented in it tells the story of a confrontation between two groups of soldiers - toys.

PC

The Godfather

Action 21 March 2006

An action game based on the novel by Mario Puzo and its movie adaptation by Francis Ford Coppola. You play as a thief, who makes his way into the world of the Corleone family. By doing various tasks for them, he climbs up the mafia career ladder and earns growing respect from other criminals. The game is set in New York, at the end of the 1940s and the beginning of the 1950s. The non-linear character of the gameplay allows you to choose the order of missions to complete as you wish.

PCX360PS3PS2PSPWiiXBOX

Guilty Gear Isuka

Action 21 March 2006

Another installment in the 2D fighting game for PlayStation and arcades, developed by Arc System Works. Guilty Gear Isuka allows you to participate in a grand fighting tournament, in which human martial arts masters and magical bio-warriors called “Gears” compete with each other. You can choose from 23 varied characters, including three brand new ones, each of them having distinct standard and combo attacks. There are also more game modes available, allowing for e.g.

PCPS2

Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Essentials

Action 21 March 2006

Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Essentials is another popular game in the series, treating the exciting adventures of a special agent working for the American government. This product was developed by Ubisoft Entertainment solely for the PlayStation Portable handheld console and is the debut of the series on this platform.

PSP

DinoHunters

Action 23 March 2006

Free network shooter FPP using Source engine. In the game we play the role of a tracker, who together with other players eliminates various species of dinosaurs. The whole was presented in the style of an interactive show played through the prism of a virtual television studio. In addition, the game uses a built-in advertising system.

PC

Dynasty Warriors 5: Empires

Action 28 March 2006

Warriors 5 Dynasty: Empires is a console fight that contains many elements of strategy games. The title was created by the Omega Force group, also responsible for previous editions of the "Dynastic Warriors" series.

X360PS2

Far Cry Instincts Evolution

Action 28 March 2006

Far Cry Instincts Evolution is a first person shooter made by the German company Crytek Studios in cooperation with Ubisoft Entertainment. According to the creators' assumptions, the game is a development of ideas that they implemented in Far Cry Instincts published in 2005.

XBOX

Far Cry Instincts Predator

Action 28 March 2006

Far Cry Instincts Predator is a shooter created by programmers from the Ubisoft studio in Montreal. It combines the basic version of Far Cry Instincts with an extension called Evolution.

X360

Daemon Summoner

Action 31 March 2006

Chronicles of Vampire Hunter is a shooter from Atomic Planet studio, which is a kind of variation on the reality of Victorian England. According to this assumption, the title takes us to London, depicting the story that took place in 1888.

PCPS2

Classified: The Sentinel Crisis

Action 31 March 2006

Classified: The Sentinel Crisis studio Global Star Software, is a classic shooter in which the action is viewed from the perspective of the first person. We play the role of one of the participants of a government project called Sentinel Crisis. Scientists participating in this project are trying to create a super-soldier.

XBOX

Tremulous

Action 31 March 2006

Tremulous is a free online FPP shooting game containing some elements of real-time strategy. The player, depending on his liking, takes on the role of a law-abiding seafarer or a terrifying stranger.

PC

Kurcze Pieczone 2: Daj mu wycisk

Action 31 March 2006

Kurcze Pieczone 2: Daj mu wycisk is a sequel to the 2002 arcade shooter Kurcze Pieczone: Secret weapon of the First World War. The player again has to confront feathered opponents with several types of firearms. Unlike the original, the second part of the cycle was moved to a three-dimensional graphical environment.

PC

Cabela's Dangerous Hunts Ultimate Challenge

Action 04 April 2006

A famous hunting game, this time in a pocket version. We play the role of a hunter and go hunting, trying to track down and kill extremely aggressive animals.

PSP

Tomb Raider: Legend

Action 07 April 2006

The seventh major installment of the Tomb Raider series. As the previous parts of the game were not received very well, a new studio – Crystal Dynamics, with Toby Gard, the creator of the original series, in its ranks – was entrusted with the game. Setting-wise, the title goes back to its roots, which means exploring ancient tombs and catacombs. During the gameplay you will visit a number of exotic locations, including Himalayas, Bolivia, Peru, Japan, Ghana, Malaysia, England, and Kazakhstan.

PCPS5PS4X360PS2PSPNDSXBOXGBAGCN

Monster Rancher EVO

Action 11 April 2006

Monster Rancher EVO is a game created by specialists from Tecmo corporation, responsible, among others, for the Dead or Alive series. The title combines the features of an action game and an RPG, referring in many ways to the Pokemon saga.

PS2

Samurai Champloo: Sidetracked

Action 11 April 2006

Using colloquial terminology, Samurai Champloo: Sidetracked is a representative of the hack-and-slash genre, but with an innovative approach to the way the game is played. The programme was created on the basis of a Japanese anime series under the same title, into which many elements of hip-hop culture were entangled. The same applies to the game, called by its creators the lost episode of the television archetype.

PS2

Army Men: Major Malfunction

Action 14 April 2006

Army Men: Major Malfunction is another part of a popular series about the adventures and battles of plastic soldiers. The last title we had the pleasure to play was Army Men: Sarge's War.

PS2XBOX

Cabela's Big Game Hunter 2006 Trophy Season

Action 18 April 2006

Cabela's Big Game Hunter 2006 Trophy Season is the next installment of a series of hunting products published regularly since 1998.

PC

Blades of Thunder II

Action 18 April 2006

Continuation of the extremely uncomplicated shooter released on GameBoy Advance. We play the role of a combat helicopter pilot and perform dangerous missions, eliminating a whole mass of enemy units.

NDS

Rogue Trooper

Action 21 April 2006

Rogue Trooper is a dynamic action game with stealth elements created by Rebellion Software studio (Aliens vs. Predator, Judge Dredd: Dredd vs. Death) based on one of the best selling comic book series in the UK.

PCPS2XBOX

Rampage: Total Destruction

Action 24 April 2006

Rampage: Total Destrustion is a dynamic action game, produced and released by Midway. It offers players fresh quality of classic arcade production.

PS2WiiGCN

Deer Drive

Action 24 April 2006

Deer Drive is a first person shooter (FPS) in which players can play the role of a hunter and take part in a virtual hunt for various types of wildlife. The development team from the Czech studio SCS Software took care of a realistic visual setting and exciting random events, diversifying the gameplay.

PCWii

Winback 2: Project Poseidon

Action 25 April 2006

Winback 2: Project Poseidon is an action game, referring to the atmosphere of political thrillers. The title was developed by Cavia studio, also responsible for the first installment of the game, called Covert Operations.

PS2XBOX

Lost Magic

Action 25 April 2006

Lost Magic is a title belonging to the RPG genre, created by a well-known Taito studio. The production for the Nintendo Dual Screen console was created with the help of Yoshiharu Sato, a talented designer.

NDS

Wolfschanze 1944: The Final Attempt

Action 28 April 2006

A first-person shooter developed by Studio Calaris. The story of Wolfschanze: The Final Attempt was inspired by historic events – the player assumes the role of count Klaus Schenk von Stauffenberg, a German military officer that attempted to assassinate Adolf Hitler in order to dispose the Nazi party of power and stop the war. As we know from history, the plot was unsuccessful, but the game offers an alternative, more spectacular version of the events.

PC

Juka and the Monophonic Menace

Action 29 April 2006

Juka and the Monophonic Menace is an action adventure game. This product tells the story of a boy named Juka, who excels in the alchemist profession.

NDSGBA

SiN Episodes: Emergence

Action 10 May 2006

SiN: Episodes is a sequel to the first-person, left-hand shooter, published in 1998 by Ritual studio SIN. The world known to us from the previous part of the game has undergone a considerable metamorphosis to meet both the requirements of players and equipment of the current generation.

PCX360

Monster Hunter Freedom

Action 12 May 2006

Monster Hunter Freedom is another part of the popular series of action eruptions, in which our task is to hunt the most dangerous beasts inhabiting the world presented.

PSP

X-Men: The Official Game

Action 16 May 2006

Action game prepared in parallel with a movie entitled X-Men: The Last Stand. However, it is not based on the plot of the film, but is a kind of bridge between the second and third part of full-length screenings telling the story of the X-Men's feats.

PCX360PS2NDSXBOXGBAGCN

The Da Vinci Code

Action 16 May 2006

The Da Vinci Code is an adaptation of Dan Brown's best-selling novel of the same title (in Poland: Leonardo da Vinci Code). The game was created on the basis of an agreement signed by 2K Games with Sony Pictures, a label responsible for screening the book.

PCPS2XBOX

Urban Chaos: Riot Response

Action 19 May 2006

Zero Tolerance: City Under Fire is an FPS game set in a metropolitan environment. We take control of Nick Mason, a member of the elite law enforcement team created after numerous gangster incidents on the streets of the metropolis. Our protagonist often gets to the very centre of riots in order to pacify the troubled people and restore the statutory order in this way.

PCPS2XBOX

Terrorist Takedown: War In Colombia

Action 19 May 2006

War In Colombia is another part of a series of dynamic action games called Terrorist Takedown. Employees of the Polish development studio City Interactive are again responsible for its creation. As the name of this production indicates, this time the players move to South America.

PC

Hidden and Dangerous: Antologia

Action 19 May 2006

Special edition of the series of tactical action games Hidden and Dangerous. It is composed of: Hidden and Dangerous Deluxe (improved version of the first cycle), Hidden and Dangerous 2 and the addition of Hidden and Dangerous 2: Team of the Sabre.

PC

Serious Sam: Zlota Edycja

Action 19 May 2006

A set of two games included in the Collection of Classics of Cenega Poland. Buyers of this product actually receive two games: Serious Sam: First Strip and Serious Sam: Second Strip.

PC

Steambot Chronicles

Action 23 May 2006

Steambot Chronicles is another production about mosses. It comes from Irem's stable and is an RPG game with action elements, in a Japanese climate and some interesting add-ons.

PS2

Jaws Unleashed

Action 23 May 2006

Jaws Unleashed is a virtual adaptation of a popular box office film entitled "Jaws Unleashed". "Jaws (dir. Steven Spielberg). The program was released on the occasion of the thirtieth anniversary of the work's debut on the silver screen.

PCPS2XBOX

Hitman: Blood Money

Action 26 May 2006

The fourth installment in a popular game series about Agent 47, the perfect assassin, completing various contracts for the ICA organization. When its members are being meticulously eliminated and 47 loses contact with his superior, Diana Burnwood, he reaches the conclusion that he will become the next target. In order to save his skin 47 decides to stop the man behind the killings, Alexander Cayn, and his terrorist organization called the Franchise.

PCX360PS2XBOX

Half-Life 2: Episode One

Action 01 June 2006

The first expansion to Half-Life 2. Its action takes place directly after the events shown in the predecessor and expands the storyline with new plots. Once more the player becomes the main protagonist of the series: Gordon Freeman, accompanied, once again, by Alyx Vance. The two characters are tasked with escaping from an alien citadel – the place where the basic version of the game ended.

PCAND

Battlefield 2: Armored Fury

Action 06 June 2006

Armored Fury is another paid "booster pack" for Battlefield 2, which for the first time will transfer users of the program to the United States. Electronic Arts and Digital Illusions made a tribute to their fans in this way. The latter have long been asking for scenarios taking place on American soil.

PC

Dynasty Warriors Online

Action 13 June 2006

A dynamic action MMO with a hint of fantasy, set at the time of the great battles in China's inner territories. The game refers to the famous Dynasty Warriors series, in which our hero confronts hundreds of opponents at once, struggling with enemies in a spectacular way. Now we can stand up to fight against other players.

PC

Armored Core: Last Raven

Action 13 June 2006

The fifth standalone expansion to Armored Core 3, continuing the storyline of Armored Core: Nexus. Armored Core: Last Raven has us play as a mech pilot caught up in a conflict between The Alliance megacorp and two groups of Ravens.

PS2PSP

Metal Gear Solid: Digital Graphic Novel

Action 13 June 2006

Metal Gear Solid: Digital Graphic Novel introduces a breath of fresh air to the mobile console market as it is the first production representing the genre of interactive comics. The project was created in the Kojima Productions studio, and its main creator is Ashley Wood, characterized by combining several different drawing styles.

PSP

World War II Combat: Iwo Jima

Action 20 June 2006

Another first person perspective title, referring to the events taking place during the Second World War. The Groove Games programmers, without being discouraged by the rather cool reception of World War II Combat: Road to Berlin, propose a campaign taking place in the Far East.

PC

Tenchu: Time of the Assassins

Action 23 June 2006

Tenchu: Time of the Assassins is the next installment of the series, launched in 1998 on the first generation PlayStation desktop platform. This time, developers from the Far East company From Software focused exclusively on the PlayStation Portable handheld console.

PSP

Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest

Action 27 June 2006

Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest is an electronic-entertainment adaptation of a film of the same name (the Polish title is Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest), which is a continuation of the 2003 hit "Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl.

PSPNDSGBA

Pirates of the Caribbean: The Legend of Jack Sparrow

Action 27 June 2006

The Legend of Jack Sparrow is the successor of Pirates of the Caribbean published in 2003. Players are confronted with an extensive action/TPP game with adventurous elements and role-playing, whose plot focuses on the careers of two characters: Captain Jacek Sparrow and Villa Turner.

PCPS2XBOX

Ruff Trigger: Vanocore Conspiracy

Action 28 June 2006

Ruff Trigger: The Vanocore Conspiracy is a three dimensional platform game. This title is for PlayStation2 owners only. We play the role of a hunter who looks like a nice and gentle dog. However, the reality turns out to be different.

PS2

TerraWars: NY Invasion

Action 28 June 2006

The first person perspective of the shooters dealing with the alien invasion of Earth. This time, aliens have chosen the cultural capital of the United States - New York (as the title clearly states).

PC

Metal Slug 3D

Action 29 June 2006

The first game of the very popular shooting series, which was presented in full 3D. However, the climate of the vending machines has not changed.

PS2

Bet on Soldier: Blood of Sahara

Action 29 June 2006

Bet on Soldier: Blood of Sahara is the first official extension of the 2005 FPS game Bet on Soldier: Blood Sport (Bet on Soldier: Bloody Sport). This is a stand-alone add-on, so having a basic BoS version is not required to run this product.

PC

Shinobido: Way of the Ninja

Action 05 July 2006

Shinobido is the responsibility of the people who created the first two parts of the famous Tenchu saga, stretching back to the first PlayStation. Just like this well-known series, Acquire's production takes up the subject of ninja - a Japanese murderer and mercenary, in which we have a chance to take on the role.

PS2

Chromehounds

Action 07 July 2006

Chromehounds is another production in which we have the opportunity to sit at the helm of ancient combat machines called mosses. The game is mainly focused on multiplayer mode (although there is also a single-player option implemented). The company responsible for this title is Japanese From Software.

X360

Alex Rider: Stormbreaker

Action 07 July 2006

Alex Rider: Stormbreaker is an action game in which we play the role of a teenage version of a spy of all time - James Bond. Alex Rider, a product of Anthony Horowitz's imagination, is the protagonist of a series of books about the adventures of a juvenile intelligence agent.

NDSGBA

Prey (2006)

Action 11 July 2006

A science-fiction FPP shooter, known as the legendary „in-development” game from the 90s. Human Head Studios, a new developer, had taken over the project from the legendary 3D Realms. The main protagonist of Prey is Tommy, a Native American, who along with his girlfriend and granddad has been kidnapped by Aliens. After waking up on board of an alien spaceship, Tommy decides to takes matters into his own hands and destroy all aliens in his path.

PCX360

The Ship

Action 11 July 2006

The Ship is a FPS game based on the Source engine. Here we are dealing with a new version of one of the most interesting modifications to the first part of Half-Life. The fun is focused mainly on the Internet multiplayer mode, although the creators have also introduced the single-player option with extended Artificial Intelligence.

PC

DevastationZone Troopers

Action 12 July 2006

DevastationZone Troopers is an uncomplicated arcade game, showing action from a third person's perspective. We play the role of an intergalactic soldier, defending humanity of the future from waves of aggressive creatures from space.

PC

WarPath

Action 18 July 2006

Representative of first person shooters, set in S-F reality, created by Digital Extremes development studio, responsible for such productions as Pariah or Dark Sector.

PCXBOX

Miami Vice: The Game

Action 21 July 2006

Miami Vice: The Game is another attempt to transfer to virtual reality the realities known from the memorable TV series, whose Polish title is Police from Miami. The product in question is not so much based on the cycle as on its cinematic adaptation directed by Michael Mann (starring Colin Farrell and Jamie Foxx).

PSP

Battle B-Daman: Fire Spirits!

Action 26 July 2006

Battle B-Daman: Fire Spirits! is a game based on the second cult season in America (in Poland it can be watched thanks to the Cartoon Network station) of a TV series about B-Damans fighting, which means B-Densetsu in development! Battle B-Daman. Production is the second attempt at Atlus' approach to B-Daman.

GBA

Zegapain XOR

Action 27 July 2006

Zegapain XOR is a position that was created on the basis of a popular (especially in Japan) animated series of the same title. In this sci-fi position, maintained in the climate of science fiction, we once again sit at the helm of big robots, popularly known as mosses.

X360

Bullet Witch

Action 27 July 2006

A third-person perspective shooter action game, in which the players assume the role of a witch that faces a demonic invasion. In Bullet Witch the players are mostly traveling through locations and exterminating enemies. The latter are sent to hell with guns and powerful combat spells.

PCX360

Pirates: Legend of the Black Buccaneer

Action 27 July 2006

Black Buccaneer is an expanded action/TPP game with action-adventure elements and a hint of horror. The plot of the program takes people sitting in front of computers to the Caribbean a few centuries ago and depicts a pirate world where the mystical powers of voodoo are the order of the day.

PCPS2XBOX

LarryBoy and the Bad Apple

Action 03 August 2006

LarryBoy and the Bad Apple is an action-packed adventure game based on the twenty-ninth episode of the famous television series VeggieTales and the third part of LarryBoy's adventures. The title character is a world-famous bandit hunter.

PS2GBA

Bad Day L.A.

Action 08 August 2006

A humorous dexterity game that is a parody of everyday life of Americans after the events of September 11, 2001 and dozens of catastrophic films. As a homeless hero, we have to deal with the hordes of enemies who captured the streets of Los Angeles. A wide arsenal of weapons helps him in this task.

PCXBOX

Dead Rising

Action 08 August 2006
